embeds.title: This can be a link
embeds.description: You can have embeds however you like them. But make sure to change the quotes style to double quotes and to have your embed colour as a decimal

fields.name: <-- You can add any colour but be sure to convert it from Hex to decimal
fields.value: This is an embed field, you can add this too. You can delete anything from here to not have it show up. Please make sure your colour is a decimal number.

fields.name: You can add multiple of these lol
fields.value: You can add images too and set their size

author.name: Use this website to make your Embed easily.
